ingredients.Manchow Soup: spring onions, cabbage,carrot,capsicum,veg stock,green chilli sauce,vinegar
ingredients.Mexican vegetable soup: yellow onion,carrots,garlic,veg broth,diced tomatoes,zucchini,green beans, oregano, frozen corn, lime juice
ingredients.Hot and sour vegetable tofu soup: ginger, green oinions, red cabbage, carrot, button mushrooms, veg broth, soy sauce, rice vinegar, chili garli sauce, tofu
ingredients.Wild Rice Soup with Veggies: Wild Rice, Bella mushrooms, garlic, white onion,carrots,garlic,celery,sweet potato, veg stock, coconut milk, baby spinach, italian seasoning
ingredients.Oats Vegetable Soup: mixed veggies like carrot,corn,peas,beans, rolled oats, mixed herbs
ingredients.Vegetarian tortilla soup: onion, garlic, tomato paste, veg broth, corn tortillas 6 inch, tomatoes, black beans, zucchini, jalapeno
